name: @so-pixel-co/css-reset
description: The So Pixel Co's CSS reset based on lots of different things

scripts.build: parcel-css --minify --bundle --targets '>=0.25%' src/reset.css -o dist/reset.min.css && cp src/reset.css dist/reset.css

author: The So Pixel Co. <hello@so-pixel.co.uk> (https://so-pixel.co.uk)
